content: a fold over brim p purl decreases k2tog knit the next 2 sts together round 1 *ssk k1 p1 x3 k1 k2tog ssk slip 1 st knit wise slip 1 st purl p1* repeat to end of round 50 sts wise then knit both sts together round 2 * ssk p1 k1 x2 p1 slip_stitch slip_stitch knit wise k2tog p1* repeat to end of round 40 psso pass the slip_stitch over then sts move stitch back to left hand needle round 3 *k1 p1* to end of round 40 sts *print out this page only for round 4 *ssk k1 p1 k1 k2tog p1* instructions to save paper repeat to end of round 30 sts 3 ©2021 northeast knits / all rights reserved hello world hi i m joy from northeast knits i hope you enjoy knitting this free pattern today i would love to see your woolly wonders when you are finished you can share on instagram #superstretchybeanie and/or #northeastknits as well as follow me on my own knitting journey on instagram @northeast knits and on ravelry my username is northeastknitsco thanks for letting me be a part of your knitting journey 4 ©2021 northeast knits / all rights reserved
